Person arrested after early-morning joyride around Masterton in 18-tonne front-end loader https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-arrested-after-early-morning-joyride-around-masterton-in-18-tonne-front-end-loader/OBZUA4FGKRDC5N6OK2EIFI32GE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-arrested-after-early-morning-joyride-around-masterton-in-18-tonne-front-end-loader/OBZUA4FGKRDC5N6OK2EIFI32GE/ The vehicle eventually drove erratically through a fence into the Masterton Showgrounds. Burnham fatal fire: Mother of teenage victim Elizabeth Marvin pays emotional tribute from hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/burnham-fatal-fire-mother-of-teenage-victim-elizabeth-marvin-pays-emotional-tribute-from-hospital/57WSOGLJLVCIZBM7ADSQBUSEFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/burnham-fatal-fire-mother-of-teenage-victim-elizabeth-marvin-pays-emotional-tribute-from-hospital/57WSOGLJLVCIZBM7ADSQBUSEFE/ Benjamin Plummer'She always has been, and always will be, our angel. Whangārei’s hugely popular Zonta Book Fair needs new venue https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangareis-hugely-popular-zonta-book-fair-needs-new-venue/LSWBRT6Z5ZD6VBIN5SJUY56HPI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangareis-hugely-popular-zonta-book-fair-needs-new-venue/LSWBRT6Z5ZD6VBIN5SJUY56HPI/ Mike DinsdaleNew venue needed Whangārei’s popular Zonta Book Fair sale. Sun, 12 May 2024 04:00:00 +0000 The Zonta Book Fair in Whangārei sells thousands of books in the group’s major fundraiser. But the fair needs a new venue this year and wants help to find a suitable space.
